hero.title: bium
hero.subtitle: Empty to Fill
hero.tagline: Intentional productivity through queue-based time blocking. Empty your mind, fill your time with purpose.

philosophy.title: The Meaning of "비움" (Bium)
philosophy.description: The Korean word "비움" (Bium) comes from "비우다" (to empty). It embodies the philosophy that by creating empty space, we make room for what truly matters.
philosophy.point1: Empty tasks into queues → Peace of mind
philosophy.point2: Empty time blocks → Space for deep focus
philosophy.point3: Empty completed tasks → Sense of progress
philosophy.characterDesc: The concept of productive emptiness - creating space for what matters

concept.title: What is Queue-based Time Blocking?
concept.subtitle: A flexible approach to time management that adapts to your reality

traditional.title: Traditional Scheduling
traditional.description: Rigid time slots. When something takes longer or unexpected tasks come up, your entire schedule falls apart.

queueBased.title: Queue-based Blocking
queueBased.description: Flexible time blocks. Assign tasks to queues based on type, not specific times. Work through your queue when the block arrives.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to intentional productivity

step1.title: Capture
step1.description: Quickly add tasks to your Inbox with time estimates. Don't worry about when - just capture everything.

step2.title: Assign
step2.description: Move tasks to appropriate queues. Deep Work, Admin, Creative - organize by the type of focus needed.

step3.title: Execute
step3.description: When a time block arrives, work through your queue. Check off tasks as you complete them.

inbox.title: Quick Capture
inbox.description: Add tasks instantly with smart time estimation

weekView.title: Week View
weekView.description: See your entire week at a glance

tracking.title: Progress Tracking
tracking.description: Check off tasks and see your accomplishments
